explains: adj. 无私的；公正的；冷漠的；廉洁的
v. 使不再有利害关系；使无兴趣（disinterest 的过去分词）

sentences.en: Her advice appeared to be disinterested.
sentences.cn: 她的建议似乎是客观公正的。

sentences.en: A solicitor can give you disinterested advice.
sentences.cn: 律师可给你公正的忠告。

sentences.en: We had both become jaded, disinterested, and disillusioned.
sentences.cn: 我们两人都变得厌倦、了无兴趣且心灰意冷了。
